column4: guys, i have mac mini powerpc 1.2ghz and 256 ram... can anybody please help how to dual boot with 8.10? please? been searching for it on google but i can't find a perfect howto ... please
this would be the way to do it... http://ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-327922.html
can i install ubuntu jaunty in powerpc?
I don't think so ... there might be a PPA for it .. but G3/4/5 support officially ended with dapper
